item.title: Trying to Host With No-IP
item.dc:creator: @volsfan18 volsfan18
item.description:
@volsfan18 wrote:

Well, obviously I’m trying to host an rsps off my computer, which I’ve done before but something is going wrong which I don’t understand. I’ve portforwarded and checked on http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/ to make sure that my port was opened. It was and I created my no-ip and have done all of that and changed my client IP to the no-ip domain that I have since my IP changes from time to time. Went into client.java and changed the line where my IP is to
server = “*******.servergame.com”;
but it won’t connect and I don’t understand why. Anyone have a step that I may be missing and could help me out with?

Read full topic
